timeline.bodyText:
wanted to call, but i think it's better to list my questions..

since we are in the isRefreshAllAfterExecution() branch, don't we have to find a way to invalidate all records?
in case of isRefreshAllAfterExecution() == false, shouldn't we still make sure to invalidate the selected record?
in the dev-test you wrote "select a product and run the process". So, i can imagine the test succeeds with a single record. but what if more than one record is selected?
maybe consult with Teo?
